A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There was a good bit of action in this movie\, but it was a complete slap in the face to the story that preceded it.

Luke's character was trampled\, Leia apparently has been watching Mary Poppins and now beings with no experience using the force can instantly wield lightsabers with expert precision.

The way this movie treated the older characters was shameful. It left me with such a bad taste that I'm no longer interested in the franchise. This ends a love that has spanned 41 of my 50 years.
